techmeme.title: Plaid raised $575M at a $6.1B valuation, below its peak $13B+ valuation in 2021, mostly to cover employees' tax bills for those converting RSUs to common stock (Financial Times)
Sources: Microsoft has halted talks for, or delayed development of, data center projects in Indonesia, the UK, Australia, Illinois, North Dakota, and Wisconsin (Bloomberg)
PDD-owned Pinduoduo says it plans to allocate ~$13B over the next three years to support its merchants, following other Chinese e-commerce companies (Tracy Qu/Wall Street Journal)
President Trump's tariffs are set to disrupt the Bitcoin mining sector, with many of the largest miners based in the US and the supply chain rooted in Asia (Ryan Weeks/Bloomberg)
Spotify rolls out new ad tools, including an AI tool in the US and Canada to generate scripts and voiceovers, and pitches itself to advertisers as "nutritional" (Jessica Testa/New York Times)
